    • Constructor Detail

      • Automaton

        public Automaton​(int ruleNum,
                 boolean[] initState)
        Construct an ECA from a rule number and an array of boolean values. The values represent the initial states of the cells, with false and true corresponding to 0 and 1 respectively. Use '0' as the default to represent false if the ECA is not constructed from a text file. Use '1' as the default to represent true if the ECA is not constructed from a text file.

      • Automaton

        public Automaton​(java.lang.String filename)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Construct an ECA from the information in a text file. The file will be formatted as follows:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getRuleNum

        public int getRuleNum()
        Return the Wolfram Code for the rule that governs the evolution of the ECA.

      • evolve

        public void evolve​(int numSteps)
        Evolve the ECA a given number of steps.

      • getTotalSteps

        public int getTotalSteps()
        Return the total number of steps that the ECA has evolved.
        Returns:
        this.totalNumSteps

      • getState

        public boolean[] getState​(int stepNum)
        Return an array with the states of the cells after the given step. The step number must be less than or equal to the total number of steps.
        Parameters:
        stepNum - The given step number
        Returns:
        an array with the states of the cells after the given step.

      • getStateString

        public java.lang.String getStateString​(int stepNum)
        Return a String that represents the states of the cells after the given step. The String has one character for each cell, and the symbols used to represent false and true are those returned by getFalseSymbol() and getTrueSymbol().
        Parameters:
        stepNum -
        Returns:
        a String represented the states of the cells

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return a String that represents the entire evolution of the ECA. The String consists of the state String for every generation joined together by newline characters.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • save

        public void save​(java.lang.String filename)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Save the output of toString() to a file with the given name. (Overwrite the content of the file if it already exists.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
